title: Grilled New York Strip Steak with Fire Roasted Salsa and Grilled Mushrooms and Asparagus

instructions.1: Coat onion slices, asparagus, tomatoes and jalapenos in 2 tablespoons olive oil. Season with salt and pepper and add to the hot grill.
instructions.2: Cook for 4 minutes on each side and remove from the grill.
instructions.3: Set asparagus aside and keep warm while preparing salsa.
instructions.4: To make salsa, remove charred loose rings from the onion rounds and place in the blender.
instructions.5: Remove and the skins and seeds from the tomatoes and add remaining tomato to the blender.
instructions.6: Remove and discard the skin and the seeds from the jalapenos.
instructions.7: Mince the jalapenos and add to the blender.
instructions.8: Add the basil leaves, olive oil and balsamic vinegar and pulse until chunky.
instructions.10: Season steaks with salt, pepper and olive oil and place on the hottest part of the grill.
instructions.11: Toss the mushroom caps in 2 tablespoons olive oil and season with salt and freshly ground black pepper.
instructions.12: Place the mushrooms on the heat with smaller mushrooms around the edges of the grill.
instructions.13: Cook the steak for 4 minutes on each side for medium rare, 8 minutes on each side for well done.
instructions.14: Cook the portobellos for 2 minutes on each side, the shiitakes for about 1 to 2 minutes on each side.
instructions.15: Slice the steak and portobellos on a bias and place on a platter with the grilled asparagus, shiitakes and tomato salsa.
instructions.16: Drizzle with extra-virgin olive oil and balsamic vinegar before serving.

questions.question: In Step 5, is the blender from Step 4 being used?
Is asparagus from Step 1 used in multiple future steps without being redefined?
Is jalapenos from Step 1 used in multiple future steps without being redefined?
Is grill from Step 1 used in multiple future steps without being redefined?
Is blender from Step 4 used in multiple future steps without being redefined?
Is seeds from Step 5 used in multiple future steps without being redefined?
Is steak from Step 13 used in multiple future steps without being redefined?
Is portobellos from Step 14 used in multiple future steps without being redefined?
Is shiitakes from Step 15 still available in Step 16?
What is the last time interval specified in Step 2?
If we skip Step 14, is it still valid to use the portobellos in Step 15?
Can we mince (Step 7) and drizzle (Step 16) at the same time?
